name: De-Fence
description:
survive as long as you can in this tower defense game with a twist. connect fence posts together and place them in the most optimal positions in order to damage as many enemies as possible. increase the risk and reward by generating new paths for enemies to spawn on.

With several different kinds of posts to choose from I'm certain you will have a very mediocre time. one of those head empty kill many waves of enemies kinds of times. ENJOY!

Warning: there is a lot of neon lights and jittery glitch effects, if you are prone to epileptic seizures please be careful when playing this game.
